website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy insulated bag that keeps food hot or cold for a very long time.
pros: The bag measures 18.25 x 12.25 x 12 inches, so it holds a lot of food
Leak-proof so you can add ice without worries
Includes side and top handles as well as a bottle opener
Keeps foods cold (or hot) for several hours and can handle more than 50 pounds
cons: The zipper is just OK quality, but the company is happy to replace if it breaks

customer_reviews.title: After owning this for a little over a month, ...
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for a little over a month, both zipper tags has broken off. and it will not stay in the locked position it keeps trying to collapse on me. If I wasn't out of the return window I would have returned it. Update! Clevermade contacted me after my 1st review. They sent me another cooler 1st one was apparently defective as the new cooler they sent me is much better so far after 2 weeks of use no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Batton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Sturdy and well-made. Perfect for my weekly food shopping runs, which can take me 2 hours or more going to several different stores. Keeps everything cool until I get home. I used to use hard cooler for this but it took up so much space in my trunk, I had to remove it when not in use, and I often forgot to put it back in before I went shopping. This collapses flat and takes no room at all, so I will always have it in the car with me! Highly recommend!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NCFirewolf

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually take time to write reviews but I was so pleased with how well this worked out
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a 10 day trip to 6 national parks. Packed flat into checked bag. Stopped at grocery store after picking up rental car- loaded up on food & drink,plenty of room, it holds 1/2 gallon milk upright, 10lb bag ice fits perfectly on top. Set it on the back seat of car and were able to save time & money by having breakfast, snacks, drinks, & lunch available at my fingertips. Never leaked, restocked with ice from hotel every night and all stayed cold. And it can be used over & over again. I don't usually take time to write reviews but I was so pleased with how well this worked out, I had to review this product.
customer_reviews.author: bebe

customer_reviews.title: Great design, folds flat and can be stored easily
customer_reviews.text: Great design, folds flat and can be stored easily! Keeps things frozen for a LONG time. I was got this cooler to transport 400 ounces of frozen breastmilk for my son and after a 9 hour journey the milk was still frozen solid. Very impressed with performance and price!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This travel cooler is amazing. Bought it for a trip to Vegas and it made the trip. It kept ice and contents cold all day in 105 heat at the pool and on the Lake. It collapsed down to pack in our suitcase. It didn't leak at all. My one request would be a shoulder strap. I will probably buy another one. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Marino

customer_reviews.title: It worked out nicely because we put it behind the drivers seat so ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooler to put in our car for a trip from Georgia to Arizona and back. It worked out nicely because we put it behind the drivers seat so we could get cold drinks and keep our traveling lunches cool. This is a very rugged cool made to last. For the trip out we used ice in the cooled. It did well but it did leak a little as the ice melted. For the trip back we used ice jell packs, These worked very ell and stayed frozen for our 10 to 13 hour drives.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Moss

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I work on the road and now when I pack up from my hotel I have this handy bag to load up with my fridge items. I really like the snap lock sides so it stays up when you want it to and the elastic band to keep it flat when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot99

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE..... After contacting CleverMade customer serviced I received a Free replacement. The replacement cooler worked without any issues, No leaks and replacement cooler kept ice over night........ Great customer service. Thank You Used it twice and LEAKED twice !!!!!!! Very thin liner. I like the look and design of cooler.
customer_reviews.author: mrhockey79

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these coolers for the boat - the reviews were good so we decided to try it. These items do not keep items cold at all - ice melts after about 2 hours, and the coolers leak. Not worth the money at all - and can't even use it for shorter periods since they leak now. I have only used the coolers about 10 times total - and need to throw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: This cooler did not hold 50 cans. We packed maybe 25 cans with ice and a 3 water bottles, and the lid barely closed. The ice also melted very quickly and leaked out of the bottom of the cooler. I would not recommend this cooler as it saturated the floorboard within an hour or 2. And then we had no more ice for the rest of our trip and all the drinks were hot. Disappointed. The only good thing is the handles seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packs well for flights!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last summer to take on a trip to Hawaii. We used it every day for 2 weeks and it held up fine for us and kept things plenty cold four our purposes--we would typically put lunch and a beverages for 4 of us in it and were out 4-6 hours ea day. It collapsed easily into our luggage and didn't take up much room at all...maybe the size of a folded beach towel. We continued to use it every week through the summer and it is still in use this summer with no signs of wear--we do treat it like we want it to last but certainly don't baby the thing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and does it’s job keeping things cool! I wish it came with a shoulder strap ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: 1 year later - still like this cooler, every time I use it though, I still really wish it had more straps! It's been amazing to keep what I need cold for about 24 hours. Original: Holds a lot and does it’s job keeping things cool! I wish it came with a shoulder strap or cross-body strap though.
customer_reviews.author: gudetama13

customer_reviews.title: Leaking all over !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is very cute and can hold a lot but I did a move across the country and I use ice and within 8 hours the ice melted and was all over my car in the front seat it leaked out of the cooler. I may have a bad cooler but at this point I've been moving around so much I just don't have time to return it so I'll just take the loss I am not happy with this cooler at all I will go back to old-fashioned old school coolers
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Take it with us everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is the ideal container to carry cold items home from the grocery store, zips around nicely, holds a lot, one container usually will hold all our cold items from one shopping trip. Folds flat for easy storage in the car. We also use it on car trips, just throw in a few of the hard plastic cold packs, some drinks and snacks and at the end of the day, when going into a hotel, everything is still cold. Have never had a tear or a leak.We now have 3 of these...and I wouldn't consider another brand if I needed more. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Soul

customer_reviews.title: Survived beach camping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little cooler- we took it camping at the beach and it got pretty roughed up over a long weekend. It kept completely cold for about 12 hours with only ice packs in hot weather. We got ice for the last couple of days and it didn't leak at all as the water melted, and kept things very cold. Needed to refill ice about once a day in 95 degree weather. Packs down and stores easily, but is very sturdy. The only thing we wished it had was a shoulder strap, because it's hard to carry when completely loaded up. All in all a great little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Leaks !!
customer_reviews.text: Cute product. Compact, easy to set up.. but it leaks! Bought this for a family reunion.. packed the beverages with some ice, and water was all over my car and the floor!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kinnon

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is okay. It is def. not the quality of a YETI or RTIC cooler but it can get the job done. It did not last very long at all the ice melted so fast in the heat of my car for 2 hours and the cooler leaked all over the car. The second day we didnt have that problem and it worked great. It is easy to carry and looks great but that first time we used it, we were not pleased. The other 2 times have been okay but keep it upright, dont overfill it, and dont let it tip or the water from the melted ice will come out through the zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Ocy

customer_reviews.title: I love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these — one for quick road trips and picnics and a second for my daughter to keep in her car. The zip pulls didn’t last long, but that was easy to replace with a ribbon. I love how much this compacts for storage. And, for a soft-sided, lightweight cooler, it really does keep things cold. I use mid-sized Cooler Shock freezer packs and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie Put

customer_reviews.title: ... on the insulation value but so far I really like the concept of it being collapsable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it during the Texas summers so I can't comment on the insulation value but so far I really like the concept of it being collapsable. I carry it in the car at all times since it takes up little room. It's very convenient because I live a distance from amenities and if I'm out running errands and need to stop at a few grocery stores, I have the cooler handy that allows me to make the stops I need. It's roomy and easy to expand and collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smart

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: ***update*** Finally put it to the test on a 4 day trip and we were very pleased. No leaks and kept drinks very cold. Only ended up buying ice every other day because the ice would naturally melt but def kept everything very cold. Might get the smaller version to carry drinks even more portable. I ended up buying another one when it was at an all time low price of $21.99, now that was a steal. Def gonna have a lot more use especially with Summer around the corner. So far so good, no leaks and hopefully it stays like that, it's very convenient and compact when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler to Take on Vacation
customer_reviews.text: My son and I flew to Florida for a spring break vacation in the Keys. He has lots of food allergies so I always rent a place with a kitchen and prepare all his meals myself. We each packed one of these coolers in our suitcases and when collapsed they are small and lightweight and don't take up much space. We went grocery shopping in Miami and packed each cooler with a bag of ice and the frozen or perishable food items. Despite bad traffic and a 3 hour drive, everything was nice and cold when we got to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I keep this bag in the car in the summer since I’m never sure when I’m going to pop into a store to buy something that needs refrigeration or freezer. I live in the desert where temps can hit 120. I don’t want my frozen food defrosted by the time I get home. Doesn’t hold many boxes of food, but enough for me. I like that it folds flat. Also good to have for road trips, camping, boating, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I have grown to hate this cooler. Quit using it after first year, recently was out of options on a trip, used it again, and realized again why I quit. No effing way it keeps things cold for 36 hours, maybe 6-8. I have mostly used it as standby while I'm waiting for my RV fridge to cool down enough to transfer food into. Snap out side broke during first year of use and further frustrates me. I would never rely on this cooler as my sole source of keeping food in while RVing, and in fact, just threw it in the trash.,
customer_reviews.author: GrannyGeek

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for travel
customer_reviews.text: We like this cooler for its ability to fold up and keep items cold. We recently used it for a flight to Eleuthera in the Bahamas so we could bring cold items to our rental. Everything arrived intact and cold. We would then able to fold it up for our return trip but ended up using it as padded storage for the shells we collected. Note: if you are bringing conch shells back always put them in your checked back as they will confiscate them from your carry on because they can be used as a weapon according to the airport screeners. I’m not kidding. They were removing shells constantly from travelers carry on bags ahead of us.
customer_reviews.author: VTMichael

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep ice - was not worth bringing back home!
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept - does fold flat and is easy to put into a suitcase for travel however, it does not hold ice for more than 2-3 hours. We even tried frozen bottles of water on the beach and they did not last. Max high was low 80's so this might last an hour in the summer! I used it during vacation last week because it was the only thing I had but we left it in our rental because it was not worth packing to bring home!
customer_reviews.author: catoco

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to keep frozen food cold on our 2 hour drive from Idaho Falls to West Yellowstone. It did a great job and didn't take up too much room in the luggage on the way to and from Idaho Falls. We also used it to keep the drinks cold while out exploring Yellowstone. Occasionally while packing the car the supports would get knocked and the bag would start to collapse. Easy to pop them back into place. We will be using this for future trips, it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer House

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a hotel trip- Didn’t Leak
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy this to collapse and put inside our luggage to use in a hotel room for drinks on a recent trip. I was a little worried about it leaking because of some of the other reviews. We filled it with ice and drinks and placed it in the hotel bathtub just in case. We were there for a week and the ice did melt some during a 24 hour period but we just topped it off with ice each morning and it was absolutely perfect. It didn’t leak at all and it kept our drinks very cold for the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: terip

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cooler paired with some frozen gel packs
customer_reviews.text: Great beach cooler paired with some frozen gel packs. Kept water and food cold all day at the beach, pool or park. We have a family of six and this held enough for all of us for a picnic, snacks and plenty of water for a day at the beach. (We did keep this in the shade of an umbrella)...I would enjoy another one of these about half the size for when we all don't go out for the day. It is durable and after a solid week at the beach it looks and functions just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. It keeps ice for well over a day, and has plenty of room. The fabric is durable and the whole construction of it is hardy. I took this on a vacation to a foreign country, and its folding design made it prefect for storing at the bottom of a suitcase. The inside of the cooler folds out for easy drying ice the ice has been removed. I highly recommend this to anyone for the beach, camping, or the like.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little cooler
customer_reviews.text: My only wish is that it came with a shoulder strap. Otherwise, it is well made, keeps things cold, and is an easy shape to load up with food/beverages. We use it for 5 hour trips to our vacation home. It does a great job of getting our supplies up the mountain in the right condition. I was a bit worried with how easily the thing snapped down into the storage position, but when there's food in it, it hasn't accidentally broken down, so no more concerns there. It looks sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: DomLazz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cooler for over a year now - we use it mostly for our boat trips. This cooler has been such a great purchase. It's lightweight and collapsable which is GREAT for travelling if you need a cooler for your vacation...it easily fits in a suitcase with my other items for big trips. It's held up super well, and it's a nice bonus to have the zip pocket in the front and the pouch in the back. And also - the bottle opener on the handle is a nice perk as well. I love this purchase...it's worked out great for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well to the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I found this portable cooler to work extremely well. Unlike some folks in reviews I read, I did not use ice itself, but rather ice packs and had no leaking occur. Might be different if you used regular ice, but I don't see the point of doing that in any portable cloth cooler since melting ice would be a problem in any of them. This cooler kept cold what I needed kept cold with the ice packs with no issues and is nice and easy to carry by the handles. I also like the foldable aspect of the cooler as that makes is very easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Carabele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this cooler for a car trip from Georgia to Colorado. The weather was horribly hot on the 2nd day going out (112 degrees on our car thermometer) but the cooler, in the back seat, kept ice solid and everything surprisingly cold even with frequent stops. (I did not purchase this to put in the trunk where I am sure ice would have melted in those temperatures even with the best of coolers.) It is light weight and easy to squeeze into a tight area which is impossible with a rigid cooler. Now that we are back I can fold it flat for storage...a big plus. The price was right and I would buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: In Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Great For Boating And Picnics
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use when boating. It has worked out really well. It is spacious and holds paper plates, ice and ice packs, meals and binoculars and books in the outside pockets. The collapsing feature has grown on me. At first when it would collapse when I bumped it would perplex me but then I realized what was happening and have come to appreciate the fact that it can be collapsed and stored in a small space. I like that feature so much I almost ordered a laundry basket with the same collapsing feature but have so far resisted.
customer_reviews.author: K. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Used this so I could have drinks ready to go in my rental car after flying in. I didn't want to but a massive normal cooler that I would have to throw away after my trip. This fit the bill perfectly when it slid right into my suitcase with loads if room to spare. Wish the zipper was water resistant, as in if the contents move around during transport the water doesn't come through it.
customer_reviews.author: NDspd

customer_reviews.title: Ice maintained for 12 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product has been a disappointment- within one hour of packing water and gatorades for the beach the ice had already melted. As a cooler - I would have expected the ice and drinks to remain cold for a period of several hours. I believe the advertisement indicated 12 hours - not 12 minutes. I will be returning this product shortly.
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Im more of a seasonal Ice cooler user which is why I love this one. Great sturdy quality and keeps things cool for ages. I drove 10 hours with some frozen pouches in the trunk of my car and they stayed perfectly frozen. I did use a few Ice blocks too but well worth the value. And when I'm not using it then simply flatten it and store away!
customer_reviews.author: Paul_Frog

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler for storing groceries in car when shopping around, big enough for many items
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one because we wanted a cooler large enough to hold many cold grocery items on a trip to the store if we went shopping. It even held some cold items bought at Costco! We also got it because it can collapse to be flat when not using, but can easily be pulled up, top snapping into place when being used. The zip was perfect, easy to use, and sealed well. Had straps to create a handle for carrying upstairs or into the house easily. Great item, shipped fast, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Toms

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This!!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Wish it had been warmer out earlier, too late to return now. Does not keep anything cold. Only items under the ice will stay cold. Water leaks out all over the place and ruined my seats.
customer_reviews.author: SRolls

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my husbands old, gross cooler that wasn't keeping things cold for very long. I love how this folds down when not in use. It's really made well. I haven't used it enough to attest to how well it retains the cold, but I bought some really good large Zero°F Cooler Freeze Packs to use that stay frozen longer than traditional packs. But honestly, a soft-sided cooler can't be expected to hold the cold in as long as a traditional plastic one. We got this mostly for transporting from home to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: PNWHiker

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made
customer_reviews.text: I drive for food delivery service and bought this bag to help keep customers food warm. Wanted to test it out myself, and it managed to keep an order from Chipotle warm enough to eat for over 50 min. I love that it collapses when not in use and has a little elastic band to help hold it in a collapsed state. The only thing I wish it had would be a shoulder strap. Otherwise, perfect size, keeps things warm/cold extremely well, easy to clean, and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Topher G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing product! I use this for when I travel for a week for work. I pre-make my meals and I can fit 8 pre-prepped glass containers. Super durable and strong, and I love how chic and subtle it is. The snapping system is also amazing for when you need to store in between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Works well for day trips with temps in the 80’s...
customer_reviews.text: Good space, does a good job keeping stuff cold on the boat. I don’t love the feet on the bottom but to each her own. I do love the lightweight folding design. Easy to store when not in use. Holds plenty of food for 4 adults for a day, or we can use it for an overnight camping trip if we pack smart. Good quality for the price. I expect it will last a few seasons of moderate use. Bottle opener is handy, and having handles is great but having a strap is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen in Green

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, collapseable, big size cooler
customer_reviews.text: We use this on long trips. It keeps our water and other drinks nice and cold. The collapseable feature is a nice touch, It doesn't take up much space when not in use. Clever to have a bottle opener on the handle.Nice, but we don't use it.I have read some reviews that it is poorly made.I haven't had any problems with it tearing or collapsing while in use. Keeps ice packs icy, I need my ice packs to be solid not just cool. I use the packs for back pain. I have no problems with this product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great but needs strap
customer_reviews.text: We got this to take to St. John USVI on vacation and it was perfect. Folds up to fit in the suitcase and just the right size to fit lunch, snacks, water, and beers in for a day on the beach. Small enough for me to carry and big enough to hold what we needed. Great buy! Kept things cold all day too. The only negative is that it does not have a shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Liked it for its size and that t collapsed. Just got back from week long trip and it leaked like crazy. My wife said it was leaking and me being the optimist I told her it was probably just condensation. Well today as we were packing up to leave camp there was water dripping out the back of my sprinter and stuff was all wet in back SOOOOO it does leak and I am now 4 days past the return date because we were camping. OH WELL.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler, could use a shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: I transported over 400 ounces of frozen breast milk in this cooler and it all stayed frozen for 12 hours! (ice pack and dry ice, too). The only bummer is that there's no shoulder strap!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks leaks leaks
customer_reviews.text: One of the first words in the product title is “leakproof,” so I don’t think my expectations were too high. Very disappointed that this product leaks all over the place. The car, chair, etc where you set the cooler will be soaked. We’re unable to put ice inside if it’s not in a bag. If we use ice packs it does ok keeping things cool. But why have a cooler if you can’t just throw ice inside?! Very frustrated. Would not buy again. Planning to buy a new one from REI instead.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on first use
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the cooler it leaked all over the back seat of my car. This cooler isn’t made to have Ice in it. This is only good if you use the reusable ice packs that don’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks within 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Used this cooler two times since getting it. I love the form factor that is is collapsible and seems to do a decent job of keeping items insulated. I recently experienced leaking after about 2 hours of storing bagged iced. I read the reviews and questions beforehand that said it does not leak so this may be a faulty item or the item just happens to leak. There are no visible signs of holes or anything inside to indicate a faulty item. I have only placed double bagged ice and cans in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Pham

customer_reviews.title: Definitely doesn’t hold ice.
customer_reviews.text: This cooler has a great concept - collapsible, hinged sides, etc. However, this cooler did not hold ice at all. We took it to the lake with it packed FULL of drinks and ice, and within 5 hours, all of the ice had completely melted. This cooler may be great for transporting cold groceries from the store to home, but I would not recommend it for lengthy outside uses. The zipper also leaked water pretty bad. I had high hopes for this cooler but, unfortunately, was very let down.
customer_reviews.author: Laine W.

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say anything for longevity as I'm only a week in with fairly heavy use at a rehab project, lugging it & packing it full every day. No leaking! Everything is staying fairly cold, with ice packs of course, so that's as good as I can hope for. I also love the quality & feel of the straps, fabric, collapsability & design. The zipper is a little inset so it needs a wiggle every so often, but not a bad thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey S

customer_reviews.title: So far, great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very hot area and purchased several of these to be used as my grocery bags from the store to my home. They are excellent, as when not in use, they collapse down and do not take up much space. When open the give a decent capacity space for the groceries and overall feel very well made. I am very happy with the purchase and hope for longevity of the product so I can continue to use for a long time. These work great as said for grocery shopping (prevents needing plastic bags!), but also would be great for sports events, picnics, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jonna

customer_reviews.title: Great for grocery shopping!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to store all my camping dishes, but it actually works great for grocery shopping. My city recently started charging for grocery bags so reusable bags are a must for shopping. I bag up all my cold items in the cooler and then they’re all together when I get home! No sorting through everything to find the perishables. This cooler is collapsible and has a nifty elastic band on the bottom to keep it flat so it stores great with my other grocery bags. I would definitely recommend this cooler and buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. We live 20 minutes from the grocery store and I wanted a folding cooler to keep in the truck to store frozen food when we shopped. This fits under the back seat when folded and open easily to pack the frozen/cold items. It's quite sturdy when opened. I will buy another to keep in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Dickens

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LITTLE DRINK BAG!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LITTLE TRAVEL BAG. HOLD ICE A LONG TIME AND STORES WELL WHEN YOU FOLD IT. MUCH BETTER THAN I EXPECTED AND WE LOVE IT. I DOES NOT LEAK AT ALL !!!--WE JUST MADE A WEEK ROAD TRIP TOURING AND IT WAS FANTASTIC FOR DRINKS AND LUNCH ITEMS. WOULD BUY AGAIN FOR SURE. THANKS AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: It leaks when Ice melts
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I put a bag of ice in it, closed it up, put it on the floorboard behind the car seat and and when I went to take things out several hours later half of the ice had melted and my floor board was wet, the cooler was soaking wet on the outside. I inspected it for holes or tears and saw none. It somehow leaks and does not keep the ice frozen but for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Montanya

customer_reviews.title: Carry deer through tsa okay
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a few years now. I mostly use it as a grocery bag substitute when shopping. It collapses well in stores in the back of my car. More interestingly I have used it twice as a means of caring wild game, specifically venison, through the airport. As a carry-on for traveling with products that may spoil it is lightweight and meets carry-on dimensions in addition to adequately preserving temperature. The product has lived up to this use very well and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich Kayer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler except for the leaking..
customer_reviews.text: This cooler was incredible the first month and a half I had it, but over this past weekend the cooler started leaking. The entire bottom and sides were all wet after using it with ice. I love the cooler and the fact that it folds so flat, I just am not going to be able to use it for swim meets or the beach if it is leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie i Coker

customer_reviews.title: Collapsable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cooler which would collapse fully that I could keep in my car full time and wouldn't take up much space. After researching dozens of possibilities, it was clear that the SnapBasket was just what I needed. I have used it several times, it is easy to handle, plenty of straps and folds down quickly. I don't know about leaking or how long it stays cold, but it sure does keep frozen food frozen for several hours after purchase. Be sure to watch the video about how to fold it down, that makes all the difference. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cooler!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this collapsable cooler for our 2 week trip in New Zealand. This worked out perfectly! We were able to fill it with ice and cold items while we drove every day. We stayed in a different hotel every day and needed a way to contain our cold items yet not take up a lot of room in the car or suitcase! Its awesome. Thank you for making a well made cooler bag.
customer_reviews.author: CharmedOne

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a 4 day trip. Used it to keep toddlers milk cold until hire check in. I placed 3 small gel freezer container and a frozen bag. It was approximately a 3 hrs period. The container should melted (not the bag)- maybe bad devices??? Anyways the milk wasn’t as cold as I would like it to be. It was a half gallon cartoon (brand new). It still seemed ok, but was expecting it to be colder. I would worry if it’s a longer trip. Maybe, we have to place ice cubes instead of the freezer packages???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! No complaints at all
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and searched a bunch of coolers. Was very happy with this perfect size, kept ice and items very cold. Was easy to clean after a beach day. Only thing that would make it better was if it were on wheels!! It gets heavy. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy, Easy to Use, Keeps Food Cold
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tote. It's the perfect size. I didn't give it 5 stars because it really needs a strap so you can carry it on your shoulder. (It's a bit awkward to carry this tote by yourself when it's full and heavy.) It did a great job keeping the food cold too. I really like that it folds very flat. I have put a little ice in it, and when melted the tote did not leak, but I haven't had a lot of liquid in it to really test it. I typically use the cold packs, instead of ice, to keep everything cold.
customer_reviews.author: AprilR

customer_reviews.title: easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 to bring on a 5 day fishing trip. They collapse very flat and when open, meet carry-on size requirements. The bottom is hard and sides reinforced. I got off the boat at 10 a.m. in Puerta Vallarta, sat by a pool in 80 degree weather until 2, unloaded the fish when home at midnight, and it was 90% still frozen with no added ice. If I used dry ice I’m sure it would have been 100% frozen. Durable, easy to carry. Could not have worked any better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Hold plenty of 12-16 oz cans.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Vegas. Works great for a collapsible ice chest. Wouldn't recommend it if YOU DO NOT have access to Ice. It requires daily dumping of melted ice as well as needing to be refilled every day w/ice...great in a hotel w/ice machine, otherwise probably not what you're after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: Used the bag to transport breast milk while traveling. Kept the milk frozen through a 2 hour drive. Love that I was able to collapse and bring ng it with me in a carry on, it does take up a lot of space when folded ( ok if you store it at home, for traveling I had to limit the items I took with me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The cooler keeps things cool. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: The cooler keeps things cool. Unfortunately, the sides always collapse and never stay snapped in place. I thought we received a faulty one at first. I am giving 3 stars simply because of Clevermade's customer service. They immediately took it back and replaced it!! (Thanks :)) Unfortunately, the 2nd one we received does the same :( but by the time we went to use it, the return window closed. Keeps stuff cool? YES. Stays snapped in place? NO. Def needs a long shoulder strap as it is too heavy to carry when full. I hear it's in the works but what would be great is if they can make a shoulder strap accessory for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Tdavig

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this.....well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we are MELTING here in Indiana and I was tired of losing food on the drive home from the store! Now my meat, milk, frozen food and fresh veggies arrive in great shape. We don't camp but this has been a lifesaver for me in this scorching heat. Plus it looks good and fits perfectly on the back seat of my pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised; a shoulder strap would be welcome
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised. I've had mine for about a year and the lining hasn't ripped. The exterior fabric is still intact. I like that it stores fairly flat. If I could make one change, I'd ask that they put a shoulder strap on it. I took one from another tote of mine and put it on the end handles so I could throw it over a shoulder. When you're moving things for a picnic, free hands are a must.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great Coolers!
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go! Super easy to fold flat. These have become a must have for my family's road trips. Good sized and fits in the backseat. Ice lasts a long time and the bottle opener on the strap comes in very handy. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KrisKrisKris

customer_reviews.title: Leaked aggressively and often
customer_reviews.text: I only used this cooler twice, and it leaked both times. Not a little leak- more than half the cooler was visibly wet by the time we made it home. The first time was on a picnic near home, and the second on a camping trip. Both times, as soon as the internal ice started to melt, it immediately whetted the outside of the bag. I ended up returning the bag, and probably won't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Fed Ghali

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cooler for me due to its ability to be stored easily in tight spots. I live in an apartment so there’s no place to store a regular size cooler and this is the perfect solution. Holds up well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Kept things cold, hinge broke after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Looks well made, very pretty piece, was leak proof provided you keep it upright (leaks through zipper if tilted. Kept drinks cold while camping in 75° weather for about 18 hours before all the ice was melted. Would suggest aside from the fact the crappy plastic snap hinge broke after a 1 week camping trip. Would be a good unit if they didnt cheap out and just made the hinge of metal and charged $1 more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sporting events
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it is our 2nd one. We ordered 2 because we have many tournaments we attend with our children. Many people complain they leak, but we use ice packs, we do not put straight ice in it. Very well made, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. C

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so pretty and functional. It’s folds down when you’re not using it so it’s great for storage. It also can fit a lot in it which is a huge plus. Only downside is that it doesn’t keep your food and drinks with ice in it colder for more than a day. I wouldn’t recommend this if you’re going camping and looking for a cooler to last you several days. Only really good for a day trip (but that’s what I bought it for) something to keep in mind when you’re considering buying
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this sturdy, easy to compact cooler. I use it weekly to bring groceries home from the store. They stay nice and cool on the 20 minute drive home and if I stop off for a few hours somewhere, the items are still cool when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Evanko

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler for trips
customer_reviews.text: Used to transport breastmilk for a 5 hour flight and ended up using it to keep the milk cold. Worked very well and was able to keep it flat in my suitcase without having to completely open it. Would recommend. Will also be using it for future picnics.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Bri

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn't buy it. Brought it on a week long trip to Lake Tahoe and the ice/ice packs melted within 5 hours. I initially went online to buy an igloo playmate and that's exactly what I wound up buying to replace this one on my trip. This cooler would work for trips to the park but if you want your stuff to stay cold majority of the day look elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It worked great! At the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to pack in my carryon. It fit perfectly right on top. I was going to a warm place and knew the cooler would be sitting in the sun. As an extra precaution, I also brought a foil Mylar blanket (like runners use). I lined the cooler with the Mylar and then put a ziplock of ice and my cold items. It worked great! At the end of the day, my ice was barely melted. I am so glad I bought this cooler. I think I will get plenty of use out of it since I fly often and then go on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Hoagy

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: MUST HAVE!~ Amazing lightweight and portable bag. Yes, it folds up quite flat as shown in the video. Kept ice for over 3 hours, which was more than enough time needed. A must have for beach or camping for sure! I got the orange because the other 2 colors were out of stock. I plan to buy one more to use for foods.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Lady

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this more than I do. Pros: snap up style makes the cooler sturdy and highly portable. Cons: The lid has deceptively thicker insulation than the sides. Only can keep ice cold for a few hours. The zipper doesn’t seal very well, you can see light through it, could use a well sealing zipper or a flap that can cover that area. Lastly, no shoulder strap, which is a strange and annoying omission. It’s quite inexpensive, and the build quality and functionality is in line with the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cooler. It has a hard structure to keep its shape but i love that its fordable so it doesn't take up tons of space in our garage when we aren't using it. I'm grateful that the handles are short and not meant to be shoulder straps because i always find those to hurt your shoulder in the long run. This seems to be a sturdy little cooler that is perfect for my husband and I. Its also a bonus that it has a built in bottle opener on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Love This Cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this cooler! It is the perfect size - not too small, not too large. I really wanted a soft cooler for my family's mini weekend outings and it's PERFECT. I love how it folds down nicely for storage, also. I got the teal & grey version and the colors are true to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler! We’ve used it several times, including for a float trip on Huzzah valley in Missouri. Holds a ton and I didn’t even know it was waterproof until we put it to the test. I love that it collapses for easy packing.
customer_reviews.author: KatoK2

customer_reviews.title: Must have item!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this insulted grocery tote!! I get so many compliments on it when I use it. It holds an incredible amount of groceries and makes carrying everything in the house so easy. My Mom loves the one I bought her too. It really is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Material is good but it does not keep stuff inside cold. We bought this for our road trip and after 4 hours in a car with 8 frozen ice packs, everything was warm or only slightly cold. However if you use this for a picnic or shorter time. It is very nice and compact. I love how it can be made compact in an instant which helps with storage.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is so clutch! I don’t own a cooler bc I live in a small place and have nowhere to put one. I was traveling via plane to the beach and didn’t even know if a collapsible cooler was a thing. This thing is amazing. It’s so well constructed and when it’s collapsed it actually is pretty flat. Holds a ton and stays cold forever. The extra pockets and bottle opener are just icing on the cake. Only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars is because it doesn’t have a shoulder strap. It holds a ton so it’s kinda hard to carry if you’re by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: A. Staggs

customer_reviews.title: used this for everything from grocery runs, to international ...
customer_reviews.text: used this for everything from grocery runs, to international travel, to beach days. keeps things cold, well made, attractive design. i get a lot of questions about it from folks in line/friends who see it because it's so neat. wound up buying this as a gift for a few folks because they were so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: K. Noto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooler use it on boat to throw fish in. Great quality and holds water and bass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use this thing all the time
customer_reviews.text: We use this thing all the time. It's great for keeping things cold for day trips or what not and then being able to fold down into nothing is awesome. Plus if there's not much in there it can be folded down a little bit to make it fit better in a packed car. Takes up very little space in the first place anyway.
customer_reviews.author: stephen s.

customer_reviews.title: Great! Keeps my milk frozen
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used it to keep my breast milk cold and Frozen while flying on a business trip that I was away for a week on. It fit all of my milk plus some food I had left over from the week. I had about a six to eight hour travel time and milk was still frozen when I got there.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived with rips in the lining
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the product arrived with several rips in the lining and tears in outer covering
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your cooler needs!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cooler bag! I bought it for a long beach vacation for me, my husband, and our daughter. It fit 4 1-liter bottles of beverages, plus all our food for a whole day. It was a nice large size to fit everything we needed. I loved the that it was collapsible to pack in my luggage yet still sturdy when it was full size to use. It was a great price for the quality. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This bag took me throughout the whole summer with no issues. Its a late review, but better late then never. The cooler stored sufficient amount of what I needed. When it first came I was a little skepticle with the size but I was wrong. It homd plenty for a picnic, beach, hike, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this cooler bag, it is big and fits a lot of stuff! The bag is well made and when things spill in the bag it doesn’t leak and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shoelover123

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for our daughter's birthday party, since we had to transport drinks to a venue twenty minutes away. Everything was nice and cold by the time food was served. The cooler did not leak at all and held a lot (maybe 50-60 small water bottles). Once I was done with it, I folded it up and stored it in the basement until we need it again. I am happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love my SnapBasket
customer_reviews.text: Nice, cute, handy basket - did not keep things cold for real long on a very hot day. I really like that it folds up when not in use. I think in the future, I'd use a hard sided cooler for things I need to keep very cold in addition to using this SnapBasket. I do love the basket though!
customer_reviews.author: LucyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and handy
customer_reviews.text: I keep them in my car. So nice to be able to shop and make another stop. They work very well. We use them on the boat too. Love that they collapse for storage
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K Combs

customer_reviews.title: Like the cooler, but does leak slightly
customer_reviews.text: Well i really like the size of this cooler and its design. Also like that the walls arent too think that take away from the storage capacity. But in its first use it did start leaking water slowly out of a corner. This is upsetting because i would think that this cooler is used in indoor/inside applications. Thats how i use mine. I plugged the leak with flexible vinyl adhesive though.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P. Rimkeit

product_meta.title: CleverMade Collapsible Cooler Bag: Insulated Leakproof 50 Can Soft Sided Portable Cooler Bag for Lunch, Grocery Shopping, Camping and Road Trips, Heather Grey/Black
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:Heathered Charcoal / BlackThe CleverMade SnapBasket 50 Can Tahoe Collapsible Soft-Sided Cooler is a smart, space-saving solution to simplify all of your shopping trips and day-to-day tasks. Its heavy duty design with durable polyester fabric has extreme durability and water resistance. This versatile cooler snaps open with ease and holds 50 cans of your favorite beverages plus ice. It features a zippered front pocket for valuables like your keys or your wallet and there is also a back pocket for additional storage. Located on the strap is a built-in bottle opener eliminating the need to worry about packing additional accessories for your next summer BBQ or golf outing. Use the bottle opener to quickly open a bottle of beer to get the party started quickly. The CleverMade SnapBasket Cooler is also a favorite of nursing women who need to keep breast milk cold for short period of time. With a leakproof insulated interior (body, base and lid), the cooler is ideal for keeping drinks and food cold everywhere you go. Measuring 18. 25" L x 12. 25" W x 12" H, it holds 30 liters (8 gallons) by volume, with a load capacity over 50 pounds. Comfortable side grip and duffel bag handles make heavy lifting a breeze. This sturdy, soft-sided cooler not only wipes clean, but collapses flat to 3" for compact storage.
feature_bullets: 50% Polyester, 35% Polyethylene Vinyl Acetate, 10% Polypropylene, 3% MDF, 2% ABS
Made in the USA and Imported

Large capacity SnapBasket Tahoe Coolers can hold up to 50 cans of your favorite drinks plus ice; perfect for use at the beach, while camping or to load up full of snacks for youth sports games outdoors
Patented SnapHinges on both sides of the cooler bags offer structured support when the tote is open; to close the cooler, simply push the side hinges in which folds the compact bag down flat
Versatile totes can be packed with lunch and a few ice packs for a daytime picnic, small enough to place in the trunk of your SUV as an ice chest on road trips; can fit in your suitcase for vacation

The perfect size for food delivery services and a great solution to haul groceries from the grocery store or farmer's market to your kitchen at home; comfortable handle and duffel bag handles for heavy loads
Measures 18. 25"L x 12. 25"W x 12"H when open and collapses flat to 3"; weighs 2 pounds when empty; lightweight bag holds 30 liters (8 gallons) by volume with a load capacity of 50 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,639 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
